name: ROBO RAGE (Unrederd)
description:
Robo Rage a game for the Brackeys Game Jam. Destroy the evil Robos destroying the world Only you can stop them. Sorry if the game is buggy. 

Programmed and designed by Unrender 3D models by Azkabl and NanPa, Music by ShineyDev. Big thanks to the people that helped.
